title: Shadow Hearts - Covenant
description:
Shadow Hearts: Covenant, also known as Shadow Hearts II (Ã£â€šÂ·Ã£Æ’Â£Ã£Æ’â€°Ã£â€šÂ¦Ã£Æ’ï¿½Ã£Æ’Â¼Ã£Æ’â€žII ShadÃ…ï¿½ HÃ„ï¿½tsu TsÃ…Â«?), is a role-playing video game developed by Nautilus and published by Aruze in Japan and Midway in rest of the countries in 2004. It is a direct continuation of Shadow Hearts; Its story starts a year and a half after Shadow Hearts in the midst of World War I. It focuses on Karin Koenig, a lieutenant in the German Army who assists in the exorcism of a man able to turn into demons, Yuri Volte Hyuga. However, after learning of Yuri's caring nature, Karin goes on a quest with him to save him from a spell inside him and are drawn into a conflict involving demons of demonolatry.

Torrent comes with 2 ISO files, one of each disk. Tested on PCSX2 1.0.0. // El torrent viene con dos archivos ISO, uno por cada disco. Probado en PCSX 1.0.0
